name: Puzzles 3310 - As good as dead.
description:
As submitted to the Nokia 3310 Jam 2 (with some other clearly marked minor changes).

You play as a drone of the Devil. He has chosen that puzzles are the punishment for some humans. You're job is to unsolve the puzzle for humans to play them again. In order to do this you have to use areas which only unsolvers can access. To access these areas you have to die. 

When alive you can push blocks and when dead you can pull them. You have to put all the blocks in their 'starting' positions and then leave the level by the entrance the human would use.

Puzzle elements are:

Block: to be pushed or pulled.

Block final place: For blocks to be pushed to.

Spawn: Entrance for Humans, exit for you.

Spikes: Checker board of spikes for death.

Revivify: Circle of life.

Credit:

Kyrion for level design!

Controls:

WASD

R to restart the level. G to restart the game.

The file titled PuzzlesRecolour.3 is a slightly changed version of the original with the main change being  colours that make game objects clearer. It was created after the jam disregarding the restrictions of the jam.
